title: 2001 Tippeligaen
text:
The 2001 <a href="Tippeligaen">Tippeligaen</a> was the 57th completed season of top division <a href="association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Norway">Norway</a>. 
Each team played 26 games with three points given for wins and one point for a draw. Number thirteen and fourteen were relegated, number twelve has to play two qualification matches (home and away) against number three in the <a href="1.%20divisjon">1. divisjon</a> (where number one and two are directly promoted) for the last spot.
League table.
